title.native: め組の大吾 救国のオレンジ
title.romaji: Megumi no Daigo: Kyuukoku no Orange

description:
Toake Daigo burns with remarkable talent and unparalleled determination. Onoda Shun struggles against the walls blocking his own path. Nakamura Yuki hopes to become one of the few female members of the special rescue corps known as "Orange." When these three young firefighters who share the goal of becoming members of Orange come together, the story of how Japan will one day be saved begins... and what looms before them is a crisis that endangers the entire country!

(Source: Crunchyroll)
hashtag: #め組の大吾 #救国のオレンジ #救オレ
synonyms: Firefighter! Daigo of Fire Company M: The Orange of National Salvation
烈焰先鋒 救國的橘衣消防員

tags.name: Work
tags.description: Centers around the activities of a certain occupation.

tags.name: Firefighters
tags.description: Centered around the life and activities of rescuers specialised in firefighting.

tags.name: Primarily Adult Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of characters above a high school age.

tags.name: Rescue
tags.description: Centers around operations that carry out urgent treatment of injuries, remove people from danger, or save lives. This includes series that are about search-and-rescue teams, trauma surgeons, firefighters, and more.

tags.name: Primarily Male Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of male characters.

tags.name: Shounen
tags.description: Target demographic is teenage and young adult males.

tags.name: Episodic
tags.description: Features story arcs that are loosely tied or lack an overarching plot.

tags.name: Bullying
tags.description: Prominently features the use of force for intimidation, often in a school setting.

tags.name: Coming of Age
tags.description: Centers around a character's transition from childhood to adulthood.

tags.name: Natural Disaster
tags.description: It focuses on catastrophic events of natural origin, such as earthquakes, tsunamis,  volcanic eruptions, and severe storms. These works often present situations of extreme danger in which the characters struggle to survive and overcome the adversity.

title.native: め組の大吾 救国のオレンジ
め組の大吾 火事場のバカヤロー

node.description:
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/sodamasahito) | [Website](https://sodamasahito.com)

Masahito Soda is a Japanese manga artist. Soda studied at Nihon University, but left prior to graduating. He worked as an assistant for Taku Kitazaki, and debuted in 1990 with GET ROCK, published in Magazine Special. His most notable series are Firefighter! Daigo of Fire Company M and Subaru.

In 1997 Soda won the Shogakukan Manga Award for Firefighter! Daigo of Fire Company M, and in 2005 he won the Kodansha Manga Award for Capeta.
An art director and the representative director of Studio Ara.
Veteran animator specialized in effects animation.
An art director and the representative director of Studio Ara.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/lmykstaff) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/lmykmusic/) | [Youtube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCywnAZhXindfqW0vHhvvciQ/) |  [TikTok](https://www.tiktok.com/@lmykmusicofficial)  | [Old Website](https://www.lmyk.jp/) | [New Website](https://www.lisamonika-yk.com/) | [Old Spotify (LMYK)](https://open.spotify.com/intl-de/artist/7a2CrMd3xwcZDDC39OKUGg) | [New Spotify (Lisa Monika YK)](https://open.spotify.com/intl-de/artist/0Kk6nIkrAuKm2vQN3qVguF)

Japanese-German singer-songwriter.

Formerly known as only LMYK, Lisa Monika YK decided to share her name on [November 1st, 2024](https://www.lisamonika-yk.com/news/hellonovember) to mark a new chapter as an artist. The initials will still be LMYK, but she wants to connect more authentically by sharing her name.

__[Twitter](https://twitter.com/toruhorikoshi) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/toruhorikoshi)__

__Toru Horikoshi__ is a Japanese composer, arranger and multi-instrumentalist.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/lmykstaff) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/lmykmusic/) | [Youtube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCywnAZhXindfqW0vHhvvciQ/) |  [TikTok](https://www.tiktok.com/@lmykmusicofficial)  | [Old Website](https://www.lmyk.jp/) | [New Website](https://www.lisamonika-yk.com/) | [Old Spotify (LMYK)](https://open.spotify.com/intl-de/artist/7a2CrMd3xwcZDDC39OKUGg) | [New Spotify (Lisa Monika YK)](https://open.spotify.com/intl-de/artist/0Kk6nIkrAuKm2vQN3qVguF)

Japanese-German singer-songwriter.

Formerly known as only LMYK, Lisa Monika YK decided to share her name on [November 1st, 2024](https://www.lisamonika-yk.com/news/hellonovember) to mark a new chapter as an artist. The initials will still be LMYK, but she wants to connect more authentically by sharing her name.

**[Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/flytetymelewis/) | [Website (Jam & Lewis)](https://www.jamlewis.com/)**

One of the most successful writer-producers of the 1980s and on, Terry Lewis, in tandem with partner [Jimmy Jam](https://anilist.co/staff/296468), has written 41 Top 10 hits in the U.S., and also with Jam, has more Billboard No. 1 hits than any other songwriting/production team in history. He has worked with legendary artists such as Janet and Michael Jackson, Prince, Aretha Franklin, Mariah Carey, George Michael, and many more. The duo has won 5 Grammy Awards, and in 2022 were inducted into the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame in the Musical Excellence category.

_(Source: Songwriter's Hall of Fame; Wikipedia)_
